CityTaps.title: CityTaps
CityTaps.description: Design, conception and implementation of a water utility parc management software, feeded by Cloud connected smart water meters. Operations on meters and data visualisation in near real time.

Mozaïka.title: Mozaïka
Mozaïka.description: Poster design for the annual show of the dance school Mozaïka Poster design for the annual show of the dance school Mozaïka

Aste Béon.title: Aste Béon
Aste Béon.description: Création of a visual identity for Aste Béon's Falaise aux Vautours, an ecomuseum dedicated to vultures in the Pyrénées. I used lintels found in the village to recreate the shape of a vulture, and the logo uses the shape of a bearded vulture's eye.

Tribal Fusion Layers Madness.title: Tribal Fusion Layers Madness
Tribal Fusion Layers Madness.description: A random movements combinations generator for all kinds of bellydance, and an ideas generator to help dancers find topics for ther choreographies.
